I am bad at coding but I have something that is bothering me.

If I have a probe or an abandoned ship in Orbit without any electric charge and no energy generation it is debris, but I can not relabel it because, guess why, it has no electric charge. So it will always appear in the tracking station as an active flight. 

I donÃ‚Â´t want to delete my dead ships, maybe sometimes they come in handy for... something. Also, historical artifacts.

So is it possible to write some kind of script, that checks for the following:

Crew = 0 (even for capsules)

AND

Electric Charge = 0

AND

no power generators (solar panels, RTG, etc...) AND power consumption >= 0

If all criteria are met, relabel the flight as debris.

Could someone do that?

Could be bad for some instances.

But can you not change it from the tracking station on Kerbin? Try clicking the name in the small popup window to the right, the one that gives info on planets etc.
